content: **knitted vest in drops daisy or drops lima the piece is worked top down with diagonal shoulders relief-pattern and round neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #windsofwintervest drops design pattern da-044 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 11 light nougat or use drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 500-550-600-650-700-800 g colour 0619 beige **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch/relief-pattern on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
